article_text: Physicians and employees who are critical of Chief Executive Officer Tony Weber are hoping to speak to Golden Valley Health Centers’ board of directors Thursday. Board members who oversee the community health clinics in Stanislaus and Merced counties have not said whether they will hear the vocal employees

article_summary:
Board members who oversee the community health clinics in Stanislaus and Merced counties have not said whether they will hear the vocal employees
Physicians and employees who are critical of Chief Executive Officer Tony Weber are hoping to speak to Golden Valley Health Centers’ board of directors Thursday.
